name: Flank Tanks
description:
Game prototype submitted to Fragment Jam. Made in late 2018 in Unity 2018.3.0b5. Updated to Unity 2019.1.8f1 for the jam.

Original plan was to make a mashup between Worms and Scorched Earth, with online multiplayer. Way overscoped for a first game, but I learned a lot. What I got done was 2-players (hot seat), 2 tanks per player, 1 bullet type, player/tank HP, terrain destruction, game over, some sound effects (no music).

I don't think I'll be continuing this game as I have others going now. But I hope you will enjoy it.

Controls
- Move: Left and Right arrows
- Aim: Up and Down arrows
- Shoot: Space
